trans-unit.source: Represents the parameters for an RSA security token.
trans-unit.target: 表示 RSA 安全令牌的参数。

trans-unit.source: This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens that use RSA encryption.
trans-unit.target: 此类是令牌属性和方法的集合和可用于创建安全绑定元素和令牌使用 RSA 加密。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.RsaSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class.

The new instance property values are set to their defaults: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 将新实例属性值设置为其默认值:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle>.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.RsaSecurityTokenParameters"></xref> class.
The new instance property values are set to the corresponding values in `other`.
trans-unit.target: 将新实例属性值设置为中的相应值`other`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode>.
The other instance of this class.
other is .
Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 克隆类的此实例的另一个的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> methods follow the Core design pattern.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.CloneCore%2A> is an `abstract` class that is overridden by CloneCore.
The CloneCore method calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SslSecurityTokenParameters.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> instance that represents the copy.
Creates a key identifier clause for a token.
trans-unit.target: 创建令牌的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: The token.
The reference style of the security token.
The key identifier clause for a token.
trans-unit.target: 令牌的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the token has an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示令牌是否具有非对称密钥。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true`.
Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically.
trans-unit.target: 非对称密钥用于公钥加密中，使用两个密钥、 公钥和私钥，即在数学上相关。

trans-unit.source: The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 公钥可广泛分发，但私钥则保密。

trans-unit.source: In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.
trans-unit.target: 在公钥加密中，没有无需交换公共密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token has an asymmetric key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该令牌具有非对称密钥;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a security token requirement.

The following properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement> are initialized: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> = <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenTypes.Rsa%2A>.
- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.RequireCryptographicToken%2A> = `true`.
- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A> = <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType>.
The requirement of the security token.
When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在实现时，获取一个值，该值指示令牌是否支持客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports client authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该令牌支持客户端身份验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports a Windows identity for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在实现时，获取一个值，该值指示令牌是否支持 Windows 标识进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports a Windows identity for authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该令牌支持 Windows 标识的身份验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a value that indicates whether the token supports server authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在实现时，获取一个值，该值指示令牌是否支持服务器身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token supports server authentication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该令牌支持服务器身份验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
